titles.title: To validate certain conveyances in the City of Tulare, Tulare County, California, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands.
Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee (Amended) by Voice Vote.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Voice Vote.

action.text: Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Resources. H. Rept. 105-171.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 105.

action.text: Mr. Hansen moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Referred to Subcommittee on Forests and Public Lands.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources requested executive comment from Department of the Interior, and Office of Management and Budget.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

action.text: Subcommittee on Forests and Public Lands. Hearings held.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

calendar.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources received executive comment from Department of the Interior.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported to Senate by Senator Murkowski without amendment. With written report No. 105-127.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 241.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 7/8/1997--Passed House amended. Validates all conveyances of specified real property made by the Southern Pacific Transportation Company or its successors to the Redevelopment Agency of the City of Tulare, California, to the extent that such conveyances would be legal or valid if all U.S. rights and interest (except minerals) were held by such Company. Disclaims any and all U.S. right of surface entry to the mineral estate of such lands.
